# Contributing
Thank you for considering contributing.

### Guidelines
- Follow the existing project structure
- Do not introduce unnecessary dependencies
- Maintain readability over cleverness


### What You Can Contribute
- Bug fixes
- Timetable data improvements
- UI or UX refinements
- Performance and build optimizations

### Workflow
1. Fork the repository
2. Create a new branch for your change
3. Make your changes and test them
4. Open a pull request with a clear description

### Notes
This project prioritizes simplicity and reliability.  
If a change adds complexity without clear benefit, it will be rejected.
